meaning: (of a monarch) renounce one's throne; fail to fulfill or undertake (a responsibility or duty).
a low or downcast state : degradation.
To recant solemnly; renounce or repudiate.
to destroy, get rid of or to stop something. to do away with completely; put an end to; esp., to make (a law, etc.) null and void
shorten (a piece of writing) without losing the sense.
to escape into hiding; to leave quickly and hide to avoid punishment.
set or declare (someone) free from blame, guilt, or responsibility.
so clearly untrue or unreasonable as to be laughable or ridiculous
